title: Renovate America Files for Bankruptcy, Driven Out of Green-Energy Assessment Business by Lawsuits
sub_head: Tougher underwriting pushed Renovate out of the energy-efficiency assessments business; another business line will be sold
body:
Renovate America Inc. has filed for bankruptcy protection after tighter regulations and lawsuits chased it out of the business of assessments for energy improvement financing.
Renovate America bowed out of the assessment business in October, according to papers filed Tuesday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del. by Chief Financial Officer Christopher Powell, who blamed the companyâ€™s exit from the market on tighter underwriting rules and growing litigation.
